General.Name: Saudi Arabia Refineries Co.
General.Description: Saudi Arabia Refineries Company engages in the extraction of crude oil in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company is involved in the construction of refineries and petrochemical plants; buying and selling of lands and real estate; and management and leasing of non-residential real estate properties, as well as dealing in securities. It also invests in local companies. Saudi Arabia Refineries Company was incorporated in 1960 and is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Adham Commercial Center, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21431
